main.name: William Tang
main.description: Hi, I'm an undergraduate student pursing BS in Computer Science, expected to finish in May 2020
main.bio: William Tang previously worked at ConexED as a software enginnering intern for Fall 2018 and an iOS development intern at Moska Studio from 2014 to 2015. He has 3+ years experience as a iOS developer with a focus on APIs and Social Networking (Facebook, Twitter, Google+) service integration. In his free time, he enjoys watching horror films, a loyal lover of Alien franchise.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
